dcterms:description: The FLORES-200 dataset is a multilingual machine translation resource that contains over 200 language varieties, with 2009 sentences for each language. It serves as a benchmark for low-resource and multilingual machine translation.
dcterms:title: FLORES-200

dcterms:description: Samanantar is the largest publicly available parallel corpora collection for 11 Indic languages, providing extensive resources for machine translation tasks.
dcterms:title: Samanantar

dcterms:creator: A. K. Madasamy

dcterms:description: The Kannada-Tulu Parallel Dataset was created for the shared task on machine translation in Dravidian languages, consisting of 8,300 sentences for training and additional sets for development and testing.
dcterms:title: Kannada-Tulu Parallel Dataset

dcterms:description: The Tulu Wikipedia dataset consists of articles from the Tulu Wikipedia, providing a monolingual corpus for Tulu language processing.
dcterms:title: Tulu Wikipedia
